I find fundamental to try to better myself daily by continually learning new things. Learning Programming was a big personal challenge that is leading me to be a top tier Software Developer. projects.name: LeaveApp
projects.description: This was an internal project with the objective of developing a webservice in which the employees of the company could book leave or sick days. This project had a couple key requirements. The login module of the project should log the user through Armis Active Directory, if the user was already log it should recognize the user and bypass the login and if the user hadn’t logging yet it should present the Microsoft login page so the user could log in the internal network. The application should be capable of handling default approval flows, according to the internal structure of Armis and custom approval flows to account for fringe cases. This web service should also be integrated with the internal network of Armis.
projects.technologies: Angular 6/7, Spring Framework, Spring Data, Spring Security, JPA, Typescript, Web API 2.0, SQL Server 2012, Oracle SQL, Postman, batch scripting, Azure AD, Hibernate, Maven, Tomcat, HTML, CSS, REST, Model View Controller Architecture (MVC)
